protein.general_function: Involved in iron ion transmembrane transporter activity
protein.specific_function: May be involved in iron export from duodenal epithelial cell and also in transfer of iron between maternal and fetal circulation. Mediates iron efflux in the presence of a ferroxidase (hephaestin and/or ceruloplasmin)

go_class.description: di-, tri-valent inorganic cation transmembrane transporter activity
